ing: 2 fresh peaches - peeled, pitted, and diced
1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "Fresh peaches with creamy avocado, bell pepper, onions, and jalapeno make a great summertime salsa. Use as a topper for grilled fish or chicken, or just dip tortilla chips in it. Not a fan of avocados? The salsa is just as great without it. The longer it can marinate, the better it is."
ins:
Gently mix peaches, jalapeno pepper, red onion, red bell pepper, cilantro, garlic, lime juice, and lemon juice in a bowl; season with salt and black pepper.
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate at least 30 minutes. Fold avocado into the salsa to serve.
